rtsimpack 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Adds shuffled condition

shuffle_cond.Rd

This function add a condition variable that contains random condition labels to a dataframe.

shuffle_cond(d, ni, np, ntc)

Arguments

d

a dataset to which a shuffled condition variable will be added
ni

the number of iterations included in the dataframe
np

the number of participants included in the dataframe
ntc

number of trials per condition

Details

The condition labels will be c('A', 'B'). As it is used in a simulation environment this labels are arbitrary.

It assumes:

  • The same number of participants across iterations

  • The same number of trials across all participants

  • The same number of trials per condition

  • That the dataframe is sorted by iteration and participant (It would be enough for each participant to be in consecutive rows)

  • An even number of trials in the whole participant. (Must be if it has two conditions and the same number of trials per condition)#'

Examples

 shuffle_cond(d, ni, np, ntc)
#> Error in lapply(1:np * ni, function(x) {    sample(rep(c("A", "B"), ntc))}): object 'np' not found
